name: prevent right click and content copy
author: Trendytech

sections.description:
This plugin is used to disable right click on website to prevent copy content save image etc, It will stop the keyboard shortcut keys such as Ctrl A,X,C,V will be disabled by the plugin

This Plugin is for one who wants to protect his online content from theft such as post text and images.

Features

  • Prevent Right Click.
  • prevent Text Selection.
  • This is the lightWeight plugin.
  • Disable CTRL A,C,X,V for windows.
  • No Negative side effects on SEO.
  • Disable image drag/drop and save.
sections.installation:
• Go to the Add New plugins screen in your WordPress Dashboard
  • Click the upload tab
  • Browse for the plugin file (wp-prevent-right-click-content-copy) on wordpress.org
  • Click \”Install Now\” and then hit the activate button.
sections.faq:
Can this plugin be used to prevent right click on wordpress site?

Yes.

Will this plugin disable right click for Administrator and Editor Also?

No this plugin will not disable right click and other features for administrator and Editor

Is this plugin paid or free?

This plugin is totally free.

What about support?

Create a support ticket at WordPress forum and I will take care of any issue.

Initial release

first update
